Marlon vive en la ciudad de Guadalupe, el vive al lado de su esposa y de sus pequeño hijo de 3 años a quien quiere mucho y daría la vida por verlo feliz, Marlon es muy entusiasta y sobre todo tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante ya que desea que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida y sobre todo sean felices. Marlon trabaja día a día como chofer de mototaxi, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 40 clientes en el día; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque es honrado.

Marlon está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un mantenimiento general a su vehículo ya que es su única herramienta de trabajo y con la cual puede solventar los gastos de su hogar, de esta manera tendrá un vehículo más seguro y podrá mejorar sus ingresos, así el seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia y poder darle una buena educación a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Marlon lives in the city of Guadalupe. He lives side by side with his wife and their little 3-year-old son, whom he loves very much; he would give his life to see him happy. Marlon is very enthusiastic, and above all he has a great desire to get ahead, since he wants his family to have a better quality of life and above all to be happy. Marlon works day by day as a moto-taxi driver. He works about 10 hours a day and can serve up to 40 customers in a day. He believes that things are going well for him in his work because he is friendly with the customers and above all because he is honest. 

Marlon is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they have provided to him, he will be able to carry out general maintenance to his vehicle. It is his only working tool, which he uses to cover his household expenses. In this way he will have a safer vehicle and will be able to improve his income. Thus he will keep working hard so that he can make his greatest dream a reality: "Having his own house and giving his son a good education."

loans.use: to carry out general maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.name: Gurije

texts.en:
Gurije is in her early fifties and has three children, ranging from 20 to 23 years of age. All of them are attending university. Gurije’s husband has been a paraplegic for almost 20 years and has been suffering from severe depression ever since his accident. This leaves her as the only provider at home.

Two years ago she started her own business in planted grape vines and has been doing well at selling grapes and also making wine to sell. Gurije is seeing a growth in her activity and that has given her a boost when she needed it.

She wants to expand her activity and renovate the old home, but now she needs a loan to build tent vines and for this she is requesting a loan of 200,000 Albanian Lek.

loans.use: to build tent vines

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Teofilo Moises

texts.es:
Moises en un hombre muy trabajador y optimista, vive junto a su pareja y su hijo de 4 añitos el cual es su adoración a pesar que es muy travieso y le saca canas verdes, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido en cualquier época del año, asimismo es visitada por infinidad de turistas ya que allí se encuentra la laguna de Huacachina, asimismo en una ciudad donde se realiza la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de algodón, esparrago y uva. Cuando Moises tiene un tiempo libre le gusta leer libros para distraerse y así como también le encanta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo: “Escabeche de Pollo”.

Con mucha alegría y entusiasmo Moises trabaja en su negocio de venta de productos para el hogar, le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 8 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable y atento con los clientes.

Moises está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que  es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran apoyo y de esta manera el podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como accesorios para cocinas, .lo que le permitirá tener mayor variedad de productos y mejorar sus ingresos para así seguir luchando día a día para hacer realidad su gran sueño.” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y una mejor calidad de Vida”.
texts.en:
Moises is a very hardworking and optimistic man. He lives with his spouse and his four-year-old son, whom he adores, despite the fact that he is very mischievous and makes his hair gray.

His house is in the city of Ica, a city characterized by a warm climate all year round. Many tourists visit the city, because the lake of Huacachina is located there. It is also an agricultural city, especially known for growing cotton, asparagus and grapes.

When Moises has free time, he likes to read books to distract himself. He also likes to eat one of his favorite dishes, the delicious "Escabeche de Pollo" (marinated chicken).

With plenty of happiness and enthusiasm, Moises has a business selling products for the home. He dedicates about 8 hours daily to his business, and he can serve about twenty clients per day. He believes that the business is going well because he is very friendly and attentive to his customers.

Moises is very thankful for the Kiva lenders, because this is the second time which they are supporting him. With their support, he will buy merchandise for his business, such as kitchen accessories. This will allow him to have a greater variety of products and improve his income, in order to continue fighting day after day to make his dream come true: "To give my son a good education and a better quality of life."

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Gunter

texts.es:
Gunter es un joven de 21 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de de Pisco al lado de su esposa con la cual tiene un hijo de 2 años de edad, Gunter es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante y sobre todo porque desea que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida. Día a día trabaja como agente de seguridad para el municipio de su ciudad, el labora alrededor de 10 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar los gastos de su hogar con mucho esfuerzo; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es responsable y honrado.

Gunter está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva porque gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, arena, entre otros para poder realizar mejoras en su vivienda como refacción de paredes, colocación de pisos, entre otros, de esta manera podrá brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y poder luchar por cumplir su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia y tener un negocio propio”.
texts.en:
Gunter is a 21 year old youth who lives in the city of Pisco with his wife with whom he has a 2 year old child. Gunter is a youth who is very inclined to get ahead above all because he wants his family to have a better quality of life. Day to day he works as a security guard for the municipality of his city. He works around 10 hours per day and with the fruits of his labor is able to settle the expenses of his home with much effort. He believes that he is doing well in his job because he is responsible and honest.

Gunter is very grateful for the Kiva loans because thanks to the help that they offered him he will be able to buy construction materials like cement and sand, among other items, in order to be able to make improvements in his housing such as repairing the walls and laying the flooring, among other improvements. In this manner he will be able to offer a better quality of life to his family and will be able to strive to realize his greatest dream: "To have his own home and to have his own business."

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as cement and sand, among others.

loans.name: Victor Leonardo

texts.es:
Víctor es un hombre de 32 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su familia, Víctor pudo estudiar la carrera técnica de Mecánica, en sus ratos libres le gusta seguir trabajado y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo, el cual es su comida favorita.
Con mucho empeño, dedicación y gracias a las enseñanzas de su padres, Víctor trabaja brindando servicios de transporte, el cuenta con un pequeño el cual utiliza para hacer colectivos, todos los días  desde tempranas horas de la mañana sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien porque es muy responsable.
Víctor se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar los pagos de inscripción, matricula y compra de materiales de estudio, ya que Víctor iniciará sus estudios de especialización de electrónica automotriz; de esta manera él podrá cursar satisfactoriamente sus estudios, así pues él desea poder cumplir poco a poco su sueño de tener su taller de mecánica y su casa propia.
texts.en:
Víctor is a 32 year old man, is single, and lives in the city of Ica. He is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to improve himself. Thanks to his efforts and to the help of his family, Victor was able to study the technical career of mechanic. In his spare time he likes to continue working and on some occasions he cooks a delicious Arroz con Pollo [chicken with rice], which is his favorite food.

With much determination, dedication and thanks to the teachings of his parents, Victor is working offering transportation services. He counts on a small car which he uses to offer group travel. Everyday from the early hours of the morning he goes out to travel around the streets of his city in search of passengers. He can work approximately 8 hours and believes that he is doing well because he is very responsible.

Victor is very grateful for the Kiva loans, since thanks to the help offered he will be able to pay the registration costs, enrollment and buy the study materials. Victor will begin his studies specializing in automobile electronics. In this manner he will be able to satisfactorily study, then he wants to be able to little by little achieve his dream to have his own mechanic workshop and his own home.

loans.use: to cover his education expenses.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos es un hombre de 21 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su pareja y su pequeño bebé de 6 meses de nació, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos Carlos no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Computación e Informática, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta seguir trabajando y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño, dedicación y gracias al apoyo de su padres, Carlos trabaja brindando servicios de transporte, él maneja un pequeño auto, el cual utiliza como colectivo, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas diarias y cree que le va bien porque es muy responsable.
Carlos se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, él desea poner el piso de cerámica y pintar su casa; de esta manera Carlos tendrá su hogar en mejores condiciones, las cuales brinden mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia, así pues Carlos espera seguir trabajando y esforzándose para que al lado de su familia pueda salir adelante y así desea lograr su sueño de tener su casa totalmente construida.
texts.en:
Carlos is a 21-year-old man living in the city of Ica with his spouse and little six-month-old baby boy.  He’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person who focuses all his efforts into moving his family forward.  Unfortunately, due to the lack of economic resources and the need to work to cover expenses, Carlos was unable to study Computer Programming but would have liked to do so very much.  In his free time he likes to continue working and sometimes cooks a delicious “Arroz con Pollo” (Chicken with Rice) to share with his family.

With much effort and dedication and thanks to his parents’ support, Carlos is working providing transportation services.  He drives a small car that he uses as a shared taxi.  He heads out to drive through the streets of his city looking for passengers starting very early in the morning every day and works about 8 hours daily; he believes he does well because he’s very responsible.

Carlos is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided he will be able to do some home improvements.  He wants to install tile flooring and paint the house.  In this way, Carlos will have a home in better condition that will provide increased security and wellbeing for his family and Carlos can continue striving and working so that alongside his family he will be able to get ahead and reach his dream of having his house completely built.

loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Jose Pedro

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 33 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente José no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar, en sus ratos libres le gusta seguir trabajando y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ceviche para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace 3 años José trabaja en una bodega vitivinícola de su ciudad, donde elaboran piscos y vinos, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él pude trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y responsabilidad.
José se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, él desea poder comprar materiales de construcción para reforzar el techo de su vivienda, ya que se acerca la época de verano y las lluvias abundan; de esta manera José desea tener su hogar en mejores condiciones, adecuadas y seguras, que brinden mayor bienestar para él y su familia, así pues José seguirá trabajando y esforzándose por salir adelante y en poco tiempo espera lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
José is a 33-year-old man, single, and lives in the city of Ica with his parents and siblings.  He is a very friendly, hard-working, enthusiastic person who has a great desire to improve.  Unfortunately, José was not able to to study for a professional career from a very young age he had to work to help his parents with the household expenses.  In his free time he likes to continue working and on some occasions cook a delicious ceviche to share with his family.

On his own, with much determination and dedication, José has worked for three years in a small wine shop in his town, where he makes piscos (a traditional liquor) and wines.  He works every day from the early hours of the morning when he begins his work.  He is able to work about eight hours a day, and believes that it is going well due to his determination and responsibility.

José is very grateful for the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they have offered he will be able to improve his house.  He wants to be able to buy construction materials in order to reinforce the roof of his house, since it is close to the summer season and the rains are abundant. This way José wants his home to be in better conditions, adequate and safe, to offer a better well-being for himself and his family.  Thus, José will continue working and pushing himself to get ahead and in little time hopefully achieve his great dream of having his own home.

loans.use: to make improvements to his house.

loans.name: Felix Fernando

texts.es:
Felix tiene 22 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pisco, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y acogedor, asimismo podemos encontrar playas hermosas y lugares muy bellos para poder visitar como las Islas Ballestas, el candelabro de Paracas, entre otros. Felix día a día se esfuerza mucho por salir adelante, el trabaja en una empresa como operario, en una empresa desde hace 6 meses y con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar con los gastos de su hogar; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante. 

Felix esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda como tarrajeo de paredes y mejora de pisos ya que es de tierra, de esta manera el podrá brindarle una mejor calidad de vida y seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Terminar de construir su casa de material noble”.
texts.en:
Felix is 22 years old and lives in the city of Pisco, which is characterized by very warm and welcoming weather. Also, we can find beautiful beaches and places to visit such as the Ballestas Islands and the Paracas chandelier, among others. 

Felix works hard every day to get ahead. He works in a company as operator for six months, and with the fruits of his work he can support the expenses of his home. He thinks he is doing well in his job because he is very responsible and above all, because he really wants to get ahead.

Felix is very grateful with Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they provided he will be able to make improvements in his house such as the threading of walls and the improvement of the floor, which is ground. Doing so, he will be able to provide a better quality of life and to keep fighting every day to realize his biggest dream: "to finish building his house with good materials".

loans.use: to improve his house (threading of walls and improving of floors, among others)

loans.name: Marcia Alexandra

texts.es:
La Señora Marcia es socia del banco comunal Nuevos Horizontes hace 10 años, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca por el sector de la Mutualista, esta ciudad se encuentra bañada por 4 ríos, su estructura arquitectónica es una mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su gente es amable, gentil y de un corazón cálido, aun conservan la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. Marcia tiene 42 años de edad, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 18 y 14 años de edad, su primer hijo está estudiando en la universidad y su segundo hijo en el colegio. Su esposo labora ejerciendo su profesión la cual es Ingeniero Comercial, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Doña Marcia es estilista hace 20 años, tiene local propio en donde trabaja de lunes a sábados desde las 9 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche, en su local también vende bisutería y cosméticos. 

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de bisutería y cosméticos para su local.
 
Su meta es terminar su casa que se encuentra en construcción.
texts.en:
Marcia has been a member of the "Nuevos Horizontes" ["New Horizons"] communal bank for 10 years. She lives in the city of Cuenca, in the Mutualista sector. This city is bathed by 4 rivers, and its architectural structure is a mixture of colonial and modern. Its people are friendly and polite with a warm heart, and they still preserve the culture and traditions of their original peoples. 

Marcia is 42 years old and married. From this union they have produced 2 children, aged 18 and 14. Her first child is studying at the university, and her second child is in secondary school. Her husband works in his professional field, which is Business Engineering. They do not have a house of their own, so they live in rented quarters. 

Marcia has been a stylist for 20 years. She has her own salon where she works from Monday through Saturday, from 9 in the morning until 8 in the evening. She also sells costume jewelry and cosmetics. 

She will invest her loan in buying costume jewelry and cosmetics for her salon.
 
Her goal is to finish her house which is currently under construction.

loans.use: to buy costume jewelry and cosmetics.

loans.name: Laura

texts.es: La señora Laura tiene la edad 29 años es soltera tiene 4 hijos es una señora muy trabajadora ella se dedica ala venta de ropa tiene mas de 8 años dedicándose al comercio actividad con la cual ah podido sacar adelante a sus hijos en esta ocasión esta pidiendo ayuda a esta institución para  comprar mas mercancía  de ropa  usada y así generar mas ingresos con la nueva ropa de temporada.
texts.en:
Laura is 29 years old. She is single and has 4 children. She is a very hard-working woman who sells clothes. She has more than 8 years experience in this trade, with which she has been able to get her children ahead. 

On this occasion, she is requesting help from this institution to buy used clothing stock and thus generate more income with the new seasonal clothing.

loans.use: to buy stock

loans.name: Roy Carly

texts.es:
Roy es un hombre de 29 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su pareja, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente Roy no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de mecánica que deseaba, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Cau Cau de pollo para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño, dedicación y gracias al apoyo de su madres, Roy trabaja brindando servicios de transporte, el cuenta con una pequeña combi, la cual utiliza para transportar a sus pasajeros a diversos destinos de su ciudad, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y cree que le va bien porque es muy responsable y trata bien a sus clientes.
Roy se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mantenimiento general de su vehículo, él desea poder hacer el refuerzo y pintado de la base de su combi; de esta manera Roy tendrá su combi en mejores condiciones para seguir brindado sus servicios, así pues él desea seguir trabajando y esforzándose para poco a poco poder lograr su sueño de tener su casas propia y su negocio de venta de comida, que con ayuda de su pareja administraran juntos.
texts.en:
Roy is a 29-year-old man who lives in the city of Pisco with his partner. He is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic man who has a great desire to get ahead. Unfortunately, Roy was not able to study for a professional career as a mechanic like he wanted to. SInce he was very young he had to work to support his parents. In his free time he likes to play sports and sometimes he cooks a delicious chicken Cau Cau [a potato stew] to share with his family. 

With a lot of effort and dedication, and thanks to the support of his mother, Roy works offering transportation services. He has a small van that he uses to transport his passengers to a variety of destinations in his city. He can work approximately ten hours a day and he believes that it is going well because he is very responsible and he treats his customers well. 

Roy is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because, thanks to the help they offer, he will be able to carry out general maintenance on his vehicle. He hopes to he able to do reinforcements and paint the base of his van. This way, Roy will get this van into a better condition so he can continue to offer his services. He hopes to continue working and make an effort to be able to achieve his dream, little by little, of having his own home and a business selling food which he would run together with his partner.

loans.use: to carry out general maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.name: Susan

texts.es:
Susan es una mujer de 24 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente Susan no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta compartir gratos momentos con su familia y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Seco de Res para compartir con ellos.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Susan trabaja como digitadora en una empresa de computo de su ciudad, ella labora todos los días y puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y responsabilidad.
Susan se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que ella desea poder comprar maderas, calaminas y cubrir los gastos de mano de obra para la refacción del techado de su habitación; de esta manera Susan tendrá un ambiente adecuado, contando con mayor seguridad tanto para ella y su familia, así pues Susan seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para cumplir su gran sueño de tener su casa propia y al lado de su familia desea salir adelante.
texts.en:
Susan is a 24-year-old woman. She is single and lives in the city of Pucallpa with her parents and siblings. She is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person, who has a great desire to get ahead in life. Unfortunately Susan has not been able to study for a professional degree in Administration as she wanted, but she would have liked very much to do so. In her free time she likes to spend pleasant moments with her family, and on some occasions to cook a delicious "Seco de Res" [beef stew] to share with them.

On her own initiative, with great effort and dedication, Susan works as a data entry clerk in a computer company in her city. She works every day and generally works about 8 hours. She enjoys carrying out her work, and she believes it is going well for her because of her good effort and responsibility. 

Susan is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help provided to her, she will be able to improve her home. She wants to buy wood and corrugated sheets and to pay the labor costs for renovating the roof of her home. In this way Susan will have an appropriate environment and have better security for both herself and her family. Thus Susan will keep working and exerting herself to fulfill her great dream: to have her own home and to get ahead by her family's side.

loans.use: to carry out improvements to her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve her home.

loans.name: Arco Iris  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Arco Iris está formado por 11 socias y 1 socio quienes viven por el Sector de 3 Marías en la parroquia de Turi en Cuenca, conocida también como El Mirador de la ciudad ya que desde allí se puede admirar gran parte de la ciudad de Cuenca, su gente es muy trabajadora y se dedica a la cría de animales, a la agricultura y al comercio. Las socias son mujeres dedicadas a sus hogares y a sus trabajos los mismos que les dan la oportunidad de mantener su independencia económica y con su sacrificio sacar adelante a sus familias. Son mujeres de un gran corazón, amables y gentiles que aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres.
 
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Perla, tiene 31 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 12 y 8 años de edad. Su esposo es profesor, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad. 
La Señora. Perla es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de sandalias y bisutería, vende solo los días de feria, y el resto de su tempo lo dedica a sus hijos.
 
Este es el segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal ya que anterior mente era socia en otro grupo. Su crédito lo va a invertir compra de sandalias y bisutería para aumentar sus productos.
 
Su meta es de seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Arco Iris” [Rainbow] is made up of 11 women members and one man, who live in the community of 3 Marías in the parish of Turi in Cuenca.  This area is known as the city’s overlook, as from there one can admire a large part of the city of Cuenca.  Its people are very hardworking and earn a living through raising animals, agriculture and commercial activities.  The women members are dedicated to both their homes and their jobs that give them the opportunity to maintain their economic independence.  With their sacrifice they provide for their families.  They are warm-hearted, kind and gentle women who continue to maintain the culture and traditions of their ancestors.

One of the members of this group is Perla, who is 31 years of age, married, and has two children aged 12 and 8.  Her husband is a teacher, and they own their own home.  Perla sells sandals and costume jewelry, which she sells only on the days of the outdoor market, spending the rest of her time with her children.

This is Perla’s second loan through this communal bank, as previously she was a member of another group.  She is going to use the loan to buy sandals and costume jewelry in order to increase her products. Her goal is to continue growing her business.

loans.use: to buy sandals and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: La señora Julia trabaja hace mucho en la actividad del servicio de la comida empezó como comúnmente se dice como pela papas y poco a poco fue escalando hasta llegar al sitial que se encuentra. Antes Julia sufrió mucho ya que tuvo que aprender de la vida sola y sin ninguna ayuda después de haber salido de su casa, se enfrento a varios problemas y a personas que evitaban que pudiera conseguir un trabajo seguro, incluso llegando a trabajar en horarios hasta altas horas de la noche y la madrugada. Ahora Julia recurre a nuestra institución para obtener un préstamo el cual invertirá en la compra de un lote el cual le servirá para construir su vivienda, es así que los créditos Kiva que se le comenta le despertaron gran interés y solicita para poder tener una vivienda que sea de su propiedad, Julia sueña con tener muchas comodidades y poco a poco conseguir mas cosas que en lo futuro podrá brindar a su familia.
texts.en: Julia has worked in food service for awhile. She started, as is common, as a potato peeler and little by little she rose up until she got to where she is today. Before, Julia suffered a lot, since she had to learn about life on her own, without any help. After leaving her home, she confronted various problems and people that hindered her from getting a secure job. She even worked until the wee hours of the night and morning. Now Julia is coming to our institution to get a loan, which she will invest in buying a plot, on which she will build a house. The Kiva loans awakened her interest and she is applying to be able to have her own home. Julia dreams of having many comforts and little by little gaining more things that she can give to her family in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land to build her house

loans.name: Elena Petronila

texts.es:
Elena es una mujer de 42 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su hijo, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, ella siempre ha sido una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que ha dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, gracias a su esfuerzo y a su deseo por superarse, Elena curso estudios de manualidades y repostería, los cuales le han servido de mucho para iniciar su negocio.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Elena trabaja día a día en su pequeño negocio de venta de juguetes, adicionalmente ella también dicta clases de manualidades en su hogar, Elena puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por la paciencia y el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Elena se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como juguetes para niños y materiales de trabajo para realizar sus manualidades, así pues Elena espera aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Elena is a 42-year-old woman. She lives in the city of Pisco with her son, whom she loves; he is her main priority in life. She has always been a very kind, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who has dedicated all her efforts to supporting her family. With hard work and a desire to better herself, Elena took courses in handicrafts and dessert-making, which have really helped her start her business.

With great determination, Elena works day after day in her small toy-sales business. In addition, she teaches handicrafts classes in her home. Elena works approximately ten hours per day. She enjoys doing her work and believes that it's going well for her because she treats her customers and students with kindness and patience. 

Elena is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help given, she will be able to buy merchandise like children's toys and materials for making her handicrafts. With these purchases, Elena hopes to increase her sales and her economic income, which wil really help her to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy toys and materials for handicrafts.

loans.name: Luz Erika

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer de 32 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su esposo y sus 2 pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su esfuerzo Luz pudo estudiar la carrera técnica de turismo, en sus ratos libres le gusta relajarse escuchando un poco de música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Seco de Res para compartir con su familia. 
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Luz trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de postres, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor preparando sus deliciosos dulces para tenerlos listos para su venta, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por el esfuerzo que pone en su labor.
Luz se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el tarrajeo, pintado y puesta de piso en el pequeño espacio que utiliza para sus ventas; de esta manera Luz contará con un local de ventas más presentable y adecuado para laboral, con ello Luz espera aumentar sus ventas, así pues en poco tiempo Luz espera poder ampliar su negocio y en futuro no muy lejano desea poder lograr su sueño de  tener una gran pastelería.
texts.en:
Luz is a 32-year-old woman. She lives in the city of Nazca with her husband and two young children, whom she loves and who are her main reason for living. She is a very kind, hardworking, and enthusiastic person, who together with her husband, dedicates all her effort to supporting her family. Thanks to her hard work, Luz was able to complete a technical degree in tourism. In her free time, she likes to relax by listening to a little music, and occasionally she likes to cook a delicious "Seco de Res" [cilantro beef stew] to share with her family.

With a great deal of effort and dedication, Luz works day after day in her small dessert-sales business. Every day, starting early in the morning, she begins her work, preparing her delicious sweets in order to have them ready for sale. She is able to work approximately ten hours a day, and believes that it is going well for her because of the effort that she puts into her work.

Luz is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help given, she will be able to plaster, paint, and install a floor in the small space she uses for her shop. In this way, Luz will have a more presentable place of business and a more suitable workplace. With these improvements, Luz hopes to increase her sales so that soon she will be able to expand her business. In the near future, she hopes to realize he dream of having a large dessert shop.

loans.use: to improve her place of business by plastering, painting, and installing a floor.

loans.name: María Rosario

texts.es:
La Señora María ew socia del banco comunal Nuevos Horizontes hace 14 años, vive por la parroquia de Paccha en Cuenca, lugar que se encuentra rodeado de exuberante vegetación, de clima frió y de gente trabajadora que se dedican a la crianza de animales, a la agricultura y muchos laboran en la ciudad en diferentes actividades económicas.

Doña María tiene 62 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos que son mayores de edad, están casados y viven independientes, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad la que construyo con el sacrificio de su trabajo. 

Ella trabaja hace 45 años como comerciante de frutas, labora de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo en un mercado de la ciudad, en su casa también se dedica a la crianza de cuyes los mismos que son para su consumo o para la venta.
 
Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de frutas de temporada para su negocio. 

Su meta es seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
María has been a member of the "Nuevos Horizontes" ["New Horizons"] communal bank for 14 years. She lives in the parish of Paccha in Cuenca, a place surrounded by exuberant vegetation, with a cool climate and hard-working people who dedicate themselves to agriculture, raising animals, or in the case of many, working in the city in various economic activities. 

María is 62 years old. She is the single mother of 2 children who are now grown, married and living independently. The house where she lives is her property, built thanks to her work and sacrifice.

She has worked for 45 years selling fruit. She works from Sunday to Sunday, without fixed working hours, in a market in the city. At home she also works raising guinea pigs, which are for her own consumption or for sale. 

She will invest her loan in buying seasonal fruits for her business. 

Her goal is to keep growing in her business.

loans.use: to buy fruit to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shoes and clothing to sell.

loans.name: Libia Mercedes

texts.es:
La Señora Libia es una socia muy alegre y amble que forma parte del banco comunal Nuevos Horizontes, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad se encuentra bañada por 4 ríos, su estructura arquitectónica es una mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su gente es amable, gentil y de un corazón cálido, aun conservan la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. Libia tiene 63 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de los que 4 están casados y viven independientes, una hija soltera trabaja y le ayuda económicamente. Su esposo labora en un taller de latonería (enderezar latas de vehículos), no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

Doña Libia es comerciante y se dedica a la venta de una gran variedad de ropa y otros artículos, esta actividad le ha permitido solventar los gastos de su hogar y mejorar su economía, viaja a diferentes partes del país a traer su mercadería. 

Su crédito anterior lo ha invertido comprando mercadería y su nuevo crédito al igual que el anterior lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa para tener una mayor variedad para su clientela, la cancelación de su crédito anterior lo realizo en la fechas indicadas. La banca comunal le gusta por el compañerismo de todas las socias.
texts.en:
Libia is a very cheerful and kind member of the "Nuevos Horizontes" [New Horizons] communal bank. She lives in the city of Cuenca. This city is bathed by four rivers. Its architecture is a mixture of colonial and modern, and its people are kind, courteous, and warm-hearted, while still conserving the culture and traditions of their people.

Libia is 63 years old. She is married, and she and her husband have five children, of whom four are married and live independently. One unmarried daughter works and helps out economically. Her husband works in an auto body shop. They don't have their own house, so they rent.

Libia is a saleswoman, and she earns her living selling a large variety of clothing and other articles. This business has allowed her to cover her household costs and improve her economic situation. She travels to different parts of the country to get her merchandise.

She invested her previous loan in the purchase of merchandise. She will invest her new loan, like the old one, in the purchase of clothing so that she will have a greater variety for her customers. She has made her previous loan payments on time. She likes her communal bank because of the camaraderie she enjoys with all the members.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an instrument (bongo)

loans.name: Clara Luz

texts.es:
La Señora Clara es socia del banco comunal Nuevos Horizontes, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad se encuentra bañada por 4 ríos, su estructura arquitectónica es una mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su gente es amable, gentil y de un corazón cálido, aun conservan la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Clara tiene 70 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijas quienes son todas casadas, 2 de ellas viven independientes y una vive en su casa compartiendo los gastos del hogar, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y más artículos los que compra en el vecino país del Perú pero ultima vez no le fue muy bien en su negocio ya que le quitaron su mercadería y no le devolvieron, esta actividad la desempeña más o menos 36 años y le ha permitido ayudar a la solvencia económica de su hogar.

En la cancelación de su crédito se atrasó por la pérdida de su mercadería pero como es una mujer luchadora con su trabajo ha logrado realizar la cancelación total de su deuda. Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa y artículos de bazar para la temporada de navidad. La banca comunal le gusta ya que en cada reunión se encuentra con sus amigas con quienes platica de varios temas de su interés.
texts.en:
Clara is a member of the “Nuevos Horizontes” (New Horizons) communal bank. She lives in Cuenca, a city bathed by the waters of four rivers. Its architecture is a mix of the colonial and the modern. Its people are friendly, polite and warmhearted.

Clara is 70 years old and the single mother of three daughters who are all married. Two of them live independently and one lives with her, sharing household expenses. They do not own their house, so they rent. 

Clara sells clothes and other items which she buys in the neighboring country of Peru. But the last time, her business there did not go very well, as they took away her merchandise and did not return it. 

She has been doing this work for approximately 36 years, and it has allowed her to help her household be financially solvent. 

She was delayed in paying back her loan because of the loss of her merchandise, but as she is a woman who works with determination, she has managed to pay off her loan completely.

She is going to use her new loan to buy clothing and housewares for the Christmas season. She likes the communal bank, as at each meeting, she is with her friends with whom she discusses various subjects of interest.

loans.use: To buy clothes and housewares to sell.

loans.name: Lam's Group

texts.en:
Lam is aged 40 and married. She lives in a rural area located in the Sa Ang district of Kandal province, Cambodia.  She has five children. Two are school age and depend upon her. 

Lam has sold fish to earn a living for almost twenty years.  Her husband also complements theeir family's income by working as a motor taxi-driver in the village.  The business earns about KHR 15,000 per day, to meet the family’s need.  She can save about KHR 7,000 each day.

This is Lam's second loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund.  (The other person in the photo is part of Lam's group.)  The past loan helped to generate a profit that improved her family's standard of living and supported her children’s education. 

Lam is leading her group of two to request a loan of KHR 1,000,000 each.  As the leader, she will use her portion to buy more fish to resell.  Lam hopes this loan will enable her to make more income.

loans.use: to buy more fish to resell.

loans.name: Carmen Del Pilar

texts.es:
Carmen es una joven madre de 25 años de edad, ella es muy alegre y sobre todo muy trabajadora ya que saca delante a sus 2 hijos de 8 y 5 años de edad a quienes ama muchísimo. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Chincha y cada día recorre las calles de su ciudad ya que ella trabaja como vendedora de pan muy temprano en las mañas y también tiene su negocio de venta de ropa en el mercado de su ciudad, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio pro su amabilidad y su carisma.

Carmen está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería como polos, short, medias, jeans, blusas, entre otros, de esta manera tendrá mayor variedad de productos y podrá seguir esforzándose por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia y ser una gran empresaria y poder darle una buena educación a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Carmen is a young 25 year old mother. She is very happy and above all very hard-working since she is giving her 2 children aged 5 and 8, who she loves very much, a good education in life. Her residence is located in the city of Chincha and every day she travels around the streets of her city since she works as a saleswoman of bread very early in the morning. She also has a business selling clothing in the market of her city. She works around 8 hours per day and can serve up to 15 customers daily. She believes that she is doing well in her business because of her kindness and her charisma.

Carmen is very grateful for the Kiva loans since thanks to the help that they have offered her she will be able to buy merchandise such as polo shirts, shorts, stockings, jeans and blouses, among other items. In this manner she will have a better variety of products and will be able to continue trying to realize her greatest dream: "To have her own home and to be a great businesswoman and be able to give a good education to her children."

loans.use: to buy merchandise (polo shirts, shorts, stockings, jeans and blouses, among other items).

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 30 años de edad, vive al lado de su esposa y de su pequeña hija de 3 años de edad, a quien quiere muchísimo y por la cual se esfuerza mucho cada día, Juan es un hombre muy trabajador, con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro logro iniciar su negocio de  crianza y venta de cuyes, Juan lleva trabajando en su negocio alrededor de 3 años, y a pesar de los inconvenientes y adversidades sigue trabajando con mucho ánimo, Juan es muy dedicado y sobre todo cría a los animalitos con mucho cariño e incluso cuando los vende a veces se pone un poco triste por ello, en ocasiones Juan también trabaja como obrero en los campos de cultivos de los fundos que hay en su ciudad; Juan cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque tiene una razón para salir adelante y esa razón es su hija.

Juan está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá construir corrales nuevos para criar a los cuyes ya que actualmente han aumentado, así el podrá tener un mejor ambiente para la crianza de sus animales y poder seguir luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hija tener una granja más grande para criar cuyes”.
texts.en:
Juan is 30 years old and lives alongside his wife and small 3-year-old daughter, whom he loves very much and for whom he pushes himself each day.  Juan is a hard-working man, who with much effort and saving has managed to start his own business of raising and selling guinea pigs.  Juan has been working in this job for about three years and in spite of the inconveniences and adversities he continues working with much spirit.  Juan is very dedicated and above all, raises the little animals with affection; even when he sells them he sometimes becomes a bit sad for it.  On occasions Juan works as a laborer in the crop fields on the farms in his city.  Juan believes that his business is doing well becuase he is very friendly with the customers and above all, because he has a motive to get ahead, and this motive is his daughter.

Juan is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they have offered him he will be able to build new corrals for raising the guinea pigs since they have now grown in number.  In this way Juan will be able to have a better environment for raising his animals and to be able to continue fighting to make his greatest dream a reality: To give his daughter a profession and to have a larger farm for raising guinea pigs.

loans.use: to build corrals.

loans.name: Ermin Niza

texts.es:
Ermin es una mujer de 30 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su familia, Ermin pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Ambiental, en sus ratos libres le gusta ingresar a internet y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Sudado de Dorado para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Ermin trabaja en una empresa forestal de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia sus labores, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien porque es muy responsable.  
Ermin se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como prendas de vestir para damas, caballeros y niños, ya que Ermin desea iniciar un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, así pues ella desea mejorar sus ingresos económicos para que poco a poco pueda lograr su sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Ermin is a 30-year-old single woman who lives in the city of Pucallpa. She is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic woman who has a great desire to get ahead. Thanks to her efforts and the support of her family, Ermin was able to study toward a professional career as an environmental engineer. In her free time she likes to go online and sometimes she cooks a delicious Sudado de Dorado [a Peruvian stew] to share with her family. 

Through her own initiative, and with a lot of effort and dedication, Ermin works in a logging company in her city. Everyday, early in the morning, she starts work and can work 12 hours a day. She believes that it is going well because she is very responsible. 

Ermin is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help offered she will be able to purchase merchandise such as clothing for women, men, and children. Ermin wants to start a small business selling clothing. With this, she hopes to improve her income so that little by little she will be able to achieve her dream of having her own home.

loans.use: to buy clothing for resale.

loans.name: José Gregorio Hernandez  (Junín) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal José Gregorio Hernández  se reúne cada quince días en el cantón Junín, este lugar se lo conoce por su gente amable y trabajadora y porque en este lugar se destila el mejor aguardiente de la provincia y  del Ecuador.

Este es un grupo de 13 mujeres y 2 hombres que hace tiempo atrás decidieron unirse y formar este Banco Comunal que les sirve de mucho ya que con los créditos, ellos han podido mejorar sus pequeños negocios. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio, servicios, venta de comidas entre otras actividades.

Una de las socias de este grupo es  la señora Fernanda, tiene  29 años  de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos  hijos de 8 y 6  años  que estudian en escuela. Su esposo se dedica al comercio.

Doña Fernanda es una mujer muy luchadora que le gusta valerse por sí misma y ayudar a su esposo a solventar con  gastos que genera el hogar, ella se dedica a la venta de zapatos y ropa por catalogo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su casa hasta donde sus clientes cuando tiene mercadería nueva, ella aprovecha cuando sus hijos están en la escuela para realizar sus recorridos, deja a crédito y cobra cada ocho días, su mercadería la va a comprar a Guayaquil cada vez que necesita. Lleva 6 años en esta actividad y le va muy bien.
 
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y zapatos. Esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos.
 
Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The José Gregorio Hernández communal bank meets every fortnight in the district of Junín. This is a place known for its friendly and hardworking people, and is famous for distilling the best liquor in the province and in the whole of Ecuador.

This is a group of 13 women and 2 men who, some time ago, decided to join together to form this communal bank. It has been very useful to them, because with the loans they have been able to improve their small businesses. They are involved in a variety of businesses such as trade, services and the sale of foodstuffs, amongst other things. 

One of the members of this group is Fernanda. She is 29 years old, married, and has two children from this relationship, aged 8 and 6 years, who go to school. Her husband is in trade. Fernanda is an independent women with a fighting spirit, who likes to help her husband in paying the household expenses. She sells shoes and clothes from a catalogue. Her sales method is door to door, but she also sells from home and even at her customers' homes when new stock has arrived. She takes advantage of the time when her children are at school to do her rounds. She sells on credit and collects every eight days. She goes to Guayaquil to buy merchandise as and when she needs to. She has been involved in this business for 6 years, and it is going very well for her.

She is going to use this loan to buy more merchandise such as trousers, blouses, t-shirts and shoes. She has been involved in the communal bank since the outset, and she likes it because of the help that the loans bring. Her dream is to give her children the very best.

loans.use: To buy trousers, blouses, t-shirts and shoes.

loans.name: Ith

texts.en:
A rural farmer from the Ponhea Krek district of Kampong Cham province, Ith is a 39-year-old married mother. She has five children, some of whom are still in school and some who help with the family's business. 

To cover her daily basic cost of living, she grows cassava and rice on two hectares each of farmland. Additionally, she can manage to earn extra income through working for others for a fee. She has engaged in cassava and rice farming for seven years and 15 years, respectively. 

This is the first loan cycle for Ith. She is seeking 3,500,000 KHR to pay for weeding and to buy fertilizer for her both crops. She hopes she will gain more yield and make more income so she can keep her children in school.

loans.use: To pay for weeding and to buy fertilizer

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more merchandise, such as: notebooks, school supplies, toys, stuffed animals, etc.

loans.name: Ded

texts.en:
Ded, who lives in the northern Albania with his family, is 52 years old and a father of three school-aged children, ranging in age from 15 to 19.
 
For the past 12 years, Ded has been raising livestock and has been selling milk and baby animals to locals. He’s been happy with the income he has been earning from it. Even though he has been the only one to bring money home, he has managed to feed and educate his children, something that he is proud of.

Ded wants to repair his stable, and this is why he is requesting a loan that is the first one for him. Kindly note that winter has started already in the region, and he has been worried about his animals sleeping in bad conditions.

loans.use: To repair his stable before the end of November.

loans.name: Learen's Group

texts.en:
Originally from the Dambae district of Kampong Cham Province, Learen is a 38-year-old married woman with three children, all still in school. She has been planting cassava for five years. To better feed her household, Learen has also run a bakery for three years. From her current businesses, she is able to earn about KHR 6,000 per day and saves about KHR 4,000 each day after daily expenses. 

Learen has been with VisionFund for three loan cycles and has successfully repaid all her loans while the other member has been with VisionFund for one cycle. The past loans have helped Learen to improve her standard of living. In a confident manner, she is leading a group of two to request a new loan. Her amount is KHR 1,000,000, while the other member is applying for KHR 500,000. Learen will use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland and to pay for labor to plow the field. She hopes her cash-crop thrives, so she can earn more profit to keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Kimyeng

texts.en:
Kimyeng, 29, lives in a rural village of the Sa Ang district of Kandal Province. She has two school age children whom need her support. 

Kimyeng has been a garment worker for three years and that is her main source of income.  Her husband grows rice and caches fish to earn additional income to support their household.  The current business earns her about $6 per day and they save about $2 each day after expenses.

This is the first loan for Kimyeng with VisionFund.  She is applying for a loan of $800 to buy fishing materials, such as nets, pliers etc., for her husband’s business.  

Kimyeng hopes to catch more fish to earn more income from her family, so she can buy a new motorbike for her family to use.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials, such as nets, pliers etc.

loans.name: Sila

texts.en:
A citizen from a rural village of Battambang province’s Kam Rieng district, Sila is 29 years old and married, with two school age children. 

To make a living and support her family, Sila and her husband have been farming rice for three years, and she supplements their income by raising pigs. 

This is the first micro loan for Sila with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund.  Now requesting a loan of $1,000, she is going to buy a hand tractor to improve her farming business.  Sila hopes to cultivate her rice to earn more income to improve her lifestyle and to keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy a hand tractor.

loans.name: Sreychat

texts.en:
Sreychat is 28 years old and she has three children: one daughter and three sons, all of whom are dependent on her and are in school. 

She is a villager from a rural area located in the Sampov Meas district of Pursat province, Cambodia, who rice farms three-hectare of land.  It is her main source of family income.  Her husband supplements their income by working for others for a fee. 

She has been a farmer for six years and Sreychat earns approximately 27,000 KHR per day.  She can save about 18,000 KHR each day.

Sreychat is a first time borrower with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund.  She is asking for a loan of KHR 2,000,000 to buy fertilizer for her farmland and to buy pigs and chickens to raise to earn additional income for her family.  

Sreychat hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income so she can improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland and to buy pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Em's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area in the Dambae district of Cambodia, Em is 57 years old and married.  She has no kid.  To make a living, she has farmed rice on 2.5 hectares of land, while her husband plants sesame on 5 hectares.  They have been in the business ten years.  She can earn about 22,000KHR per day and manages to save about 12,000KHR each day after expenses.

Em has been with VisionFund for three loan cycles and has completely repaid the loans.  Em successfully used the loans to support her family and her business. 

She is leading her group of three to apply for this loan.  As the leader, she is going to utilize her portion to buy fertilizer and pesticide, and pay for labor costs.. Em hopes this loan will enable her to improve her business and make more income to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticide, and pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Thy's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural village of Battambang province’s Ratanak Mondul district, Thy is a 26 year-old married mother of one school age son. 

She and her husband have earned a living by planting corn on one-hectare of farmland, for ten years. To increase their income, they also work for others for a fee.  Their current business earns her about 22,000KHR per day, and she manages to save about 10,000KHR each day for future needs.
 
This is a group loan.  Thy and her group have been members of VisionFund for one cycle.  Their past loan helped her support her family and business. Now leading her group to apply for a loan, Thy will use her portion to buy fertilizers, pesticides and labor to support her corn crop. 

With this loan, Thy hopes to increase her business and improve her family’s living standard and keep her son in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and labor to support her corn crop.

loans.name: Sean's Group

texts.en:
Sean is a 57-year-old resident from the Sampov Meas district of Pursat province. She is married and has seven children, two of whom depend on her and have their own employment to help the family generate income. She has been engaged in farming rice on three hectares of farmland for five years. She has been in this business for five years and is able to earn about 27,000 KHR per day. The main challenge for her farming business is drought.

Sean has had three previous loans with VisionFund and has completely repaid them. The past three loans have helped her to manage her business and maintain a standard of living for her family. She has now formed a group of three to request a new loan. Sean and her group members are applying for 1,400,000 KHR each. As the group leader, she is going to use her loan portion to buy cows for raising and to help her in the rice-field. She hopes this loan will enable her to have cows as additional labor to earn more income to better her living condition.

loans.use: To buy cows for raising and to help her in the rice field.

loans.name: Noun's Group

texts.en:
Noun is 36 years old, married and lives in a rural village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She has three children, two of whom are dependents and still in school. To support the family, she and her husband have been in the farming business for ten years and complement the income by working as paid workers in the village. The current business earns her family about 16,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Noun’s group consists of two members who have already been members of Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for one cycle. Noun successfully used the past loan to provide sufficient food for her family and education for her children. 

She and her group member are now applying for a loan of 1,000,000 KHR each. As the leader, she is going to use a portion of it to buy fertilizer and pesticide for her farmland and another portion of it on labour costs. With this loan, she hopes to expand her current farming business to earn a larger income, in order to improve her family’s living condition and keep their children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pesticide for her farmland.

loans.name: Saret's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area located in the Moung Russey district of Cambodia, Saret is 37 years old and married. She has three children, all of whom are still in school and dependent on her. To make a living and take care of her children, she is a grocery-seller.  She has been in the business for several years. She is able to earn approximately 20,000 KHR and manages to save about 10,000 KHR each day after daily expenses. 

Saret has been with VisionFund for two loan cycles and completely repaid the loans while the other member has been with VisionFund for one loan cycle. Saret successfully used the loans from VisionFund to better support her family’s living. She is now leading her group to apply for a loan for a loan of 400,000 KHR each. As the leader, she is going use her portion to buy piglets to raise in order to additional income for the family. She hopes this loan will enable her to improve her business and make more income to improve her lifestyle and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy piglets to raise.

loans.name: Katrina

texts.en:
Katrina is a 57 years old grandmother to a one year old boy, and she loves him dearly.  She feels that she is more dedicated to him than to her four children.

In the region where they reside, livestock is the main business activity for many locals, and they enjoy doing it.  Like so many others, Katrina has looked after cows and raised baby calves and sold milk and baby animals for a long time.  She has been able to save some money from the activity, yet not enough to pay for a badly needed home repair.

The loan she is requesting of 100,000 Albanian Lek, will enable her to repair her rundown family house.

loans.use: to repair her rundown family home.

loans.name: Kimcheng's Group

texts.en:
Kimcheng, 30, lives in one of the remote areas of the Kror Kor district of Pursat province. She has three dependent children, two daughters and one son, who is still in school. To support her family, she has been selling grocery items as the main source of income. To better feed the family, her husband also works as a paid worker in local area. She has been in this businesses for two years, and she is able to save only KHR 10,000 per day. 

This is the first microloan for Kimcheng’s group of two with VisionFund. She is now leading her group to request a loan of KHR 1,000,000 each. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy more grocery items for resale such as salt, eggs, sugar etc. She hopes to earn more income from the current business so as to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy more grocery items for resale.

loans.name: Chanry

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Thmor Koul district of Battambang province, Chanry is a 31-year-old married father of three children who are dependent on him and still in school. Rice farming has been the main source of his family’s income for eight years and to better support the family and help to earn more income, his wife plants vegetables such as cabbages, salad etc. Together, they can earn about 60,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs and manage to save about 20,000 KHR each day for the future needs after offsetting daily expenses. 

Chanry is the first cycled client with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. He is now requesting a loan of KHR 1,500,000. He wants to use his portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for his cultivated land. With this loan, he hopes to grow his rice and vegetables fruitfully and healthily and also hopes to make more income to improve his standard of living and keep his children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seeds for his cultivated land.

loans.name: Phal's Group

texts.en:
Phal, age 31, lives in a wooden house in a village in the Thmor Koul District, and she is married. She is the mother of three children, all of whom are still in school. Rice farming is the only source of income for her family, which Phal has been doing for three years to make a living. To add more income, her husband also works for others for a fee. From the current business, she is able to earn about 20,000 KHR per day and manages to save about 5,000 KHR each day after daily expenses. 

Phal has been with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for four loan cycles, and she completely paid back those loans while the other member has been with VisionFund for one loan cycle. After the loans, Phal feels confident that she will make her life better. Now, Phal and her group member are applying for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy a proper bike for her children to commute to school. She hopes this loan will enable her to keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy a proper bike for her children to commute to school.

loans.name: Kisern's Group

texts.en:
Kisern, 33, lives in a rural village of Battambang province’s Thmor Koul district, Cambodia. He is married and has two children who are too young for school. For the last seven years, Kisern has been working as a rice farmer and also working for others for a fee. Now he can earn about 25,000 KHR per day and manages to save about 12,000 KHR each day after offsetting daily expenses.

Kisern’s group consists of two people and they have been members of Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for one cycle already.  He completely repaid the loan, using it wisely and successfully to improve his family’s livelihood. Kisern is now leading his group to request another loan. As the leader, he is going to use his portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for his farmland. He hopes this loan will enable him to get a high yield from his farming business. This will raise his standard of living and help him send his children to school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seeds for his farmland

loans.name: Mom's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area located in Kampong Cham province’s Ponhea Krek district, Mom is the 40-year-old mother of two children who are dependent and help with the family’s business. To better feed the family, Mom has been involved in growing rice on 2 hectares of farmland and cassava and rubber on 6 hectares of farmland. Having been in the business for twenty-four years, she can make a daily income from her current business of 50,000 KHR. She is able to save about 20,000 KHR per day after expenses for her family's future needs.

Mom has been with VisionFund for two cycles and completely repaid back her past loans, which have helped her relieve her family’s burdens and improve their livelihood. Now she is leading her group of four to request a new loan. Mom, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farm; she will also use a portion of it to buy rubber seedlings for her rubber planting business. She hopes to gain a high crop yields from her plantation business, which she can sell for a good price. She will use the profits to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Sithou's Group

texts.en:
Sithou is a 34-year-old mother of five children. She earns a living through farming rice, and her husband plants cassava to gain extra income to support the family. She has been in this business for fifteen years, and it earns her about 21,000 KHR per day. All of her children are still in school. 

Sithou’s group consists of two members who live in the same village. She is in her first loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to apply for a loan. Sithou will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farm; he will also use a portion of it to pay for labor. She hopes to increase her family’s income from her current business to reach a higher standard of living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Chantha's Group

texts.en:
Chantha lives in a rural village of the Ek Phnom district of Battambang province, Cambodia.  She is 42 years old and widowed with three school age children.  To feed her family, she has sold fish and worked for others for a fee for the past five years. 

Chantha has been with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for four cycles, while the other members have been with VisionFund from three to five cycles. Chantha completely repaid the past loans which have helped her support her family with enough foods.  Now she is leading her group of three to ask for a loan of KHR1,400,000KHR each. 

As the leader, Chantha is going to use her portion to buy fish to resell.  She hopes to increase her family’s income, improve her family's standard of living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fish to resell.

loans.name: Nang's Group

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in Kampong Cham province’s Dambae district, Nang is now 22 years old, married, and a mother of two sons. Nang and her husband are farmers who plant cassava as their main business to support the family, and she supplements the family’s income by selling grocery items. Having been in the business for five years, they are able to make daily earnings of 44,000KHR and manage to save about 20,000KHR each day after offsetting expenses. Low yield resulting from flood is the main challenge for her farming business.

Now leading her group of three to request their first loan with Kiva’s partner VisionFund, Nang will use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland and buy piglets to raise to earn additional income for the family. Nang hopes this loan will enable her to grow her crops healthily to make more income to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland.

loans.name: Thouk's Group

texts.en:
Thouk is 47 years old and single.  She lives in a rural village of the Ratanak Mondul district where crop farming is a common way to make a living. 

Like other villagers, rice farming has been her family’s main source of income.  Thouk also sells grocery items in the village.  She earns about 30,000KHR per day and Thouk manages to save about 20,000KHR each day after deducting expenses. 

Thouk’s group consists of two members who are female.  She has been a member of VisionFund for three cycles and completely paid back the loans.  Her group members have been with VisionFund from one to five cycles.   The past loans have helped her family and supported her business.  

Thouk wants to use her portion of this loan to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland.  She hopes to grow her rice fruitfully and healthily, and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland.

loans.name: Ulugbek

texts.ru: Улугбек молодой парень .   Он  очень трудолюбивый и  добрый человек.    Улугбек не женат, но он помогает своим родителям.   По семейным обстоятельствам он не смог учиться и теперь вынужден заниматься только животноводством.   Улугбек откармливает скот дома. Куплей продажей занимается тоже сам.  Этим видом    деятельности  он занимается более пяти лет.    Дома Улугбек имеет 7-голов крупно рогатого скота .  Это их единственный доход и  для него этот бизнес очень важен.    Улугбек старается развивать свой бизнес  и на полученный кредит планирует купить крупно рогатый скот.   Он заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Ulugbek is a young man. He is a very hardworking and kind person. Ulugbek is not married, but he helps his parents. For family reasons, he was unable to study and now has to deal only with animal husbandry. Ulugbek feeds the cattle at home. He is also involved in buying and selling. He has been engaged in this activity for more than five years. Ulugbek's household has seven head of cattle. It is their only income and for him, this business is very important. Ulugbek tries to grow his business and on receiving the loan, plans to buy cattle. He thanks Arvand in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Heak's Group

texts.en:
Heak, 47, is married and living with his son in a rural village of the Thmor Koul district of Battambang province, Cambodia. He and his wife earn a living through farming and working for other people for a fee. They have been in this business for eight years, earning about KHR 20,000 per day and are able to save about KHR 8,000 each day after expenses for the future needs. 

Heak’s group consists of four members who have been with VisionFund for four cycles. The past loans, which Heak fully paid back, have supported his family and given them sufficient food. Now he is leading his group to ask for a loan. Heak wants to use his portion to buy seeds and fertilizer for his farmland and use a portion of it to spend on labor costs. He hopes his crop yield will become more productive so he can sell it for a good price to improve his family living’s conditions.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer for his farmland.

loans.name: Chhy's Group

texts.en:
Chhy is 48 years old and married with seven children.  Three are dependent upon her and work in the local area to support their family.  She lives in a rural village of Battambang province’s Thmor Koul district. 

Chhy has earned a living by farming rice for 20 years.  Her husband is a motor taxi driver and earns additional income for their family.  Her business earns about 33,000KHR per day, and she manages to save about 10,000KHR each day after deducting daily expenses.  Low crop yield, resulting from a flood is her main business challenge.

Chhy’s group consists of two women, and she has been with VisionFund for four cycles.  The other member has been with VisionFund for three cycles. Chhy successfully repaid the past loans which helped her support her family and business. 

Now Chhy is leading her group to apply for another loan.  She wants to use her portion to buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland.  Chhy hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her business in order to improve her family’s living conditions

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Chita's Group

texts.en:
Chita is 33 years old and married with seven dependent children, all of whom are still in school. She and her husband have worked very hard for ten years to support their big family by farming rice and working as paid workers in the local area. The current business earns them about KHR 36,000 per day and they manage to save about KHR 20,000 each day after expenses. The main challenge for her farming business is drought. 

Chita’s group consists of two members who have been with VisionFund for two cycles and completely paid back the past loans which have helped her better support her current business. Now she is leading her group to request another loan of KHR2,000,000 each. Chita, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice healthfully and in a timely way so as to sell it for a good price to improve her standard of living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Vanthon's Group

texts.en:
Vanthon lives in a rural village of the Thmor Koul district of Battambang province, Cambodia.  He is 28 years old and married with one son who is too young for school.
