Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, el producto es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y además con un excelente servicio es muy conocida en la zona donde reside, tiene mucha experiencia en las ventas y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que le permite estar adelante de la competencia y obtener las  mejores ganancias; Ana es una mujer que ama su labor, trabaja desde muy temprano para al final del día poder compartir con lo mas importante para ella su familia, es emprendedora, enérgica y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere alcanzar el éxito y no descansará hasta lograrlo. En las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda de su producto y necesita aumentar la inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, gas propano, etc. Ana Daisy tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, se siente satisfecha con la colaboración, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el periodo establecido y al mismo tiempo tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Ana Deisy, 47, lives with her two daughters in her own house.  She makes a living selling tortillas.  Her product is top quality and affordable, and her service is excellent.

She's well known in the area where she lives.  She has a lot of experience in sales and has acquired a lot of customers, which allows her to stay ahead of the competition and get the best profits.

Ana's a woman who loves her job.  She works from an early hour so at the end of the day she can share the most important thing with her family.  She's enterprising and energetic, and has a great desire to get ahead.  She wants to be successful and won't rest until she is.

Demand for her product has increased in the last few weeks and she needs to increase her investment, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy corn wholesale, propane gas, etc.

Ana Deisy has a good payment record among her acquaintances.  She's satisfied with the cooperation and is certain she'll be able to repay the loan on time.  She also trusts that she'll be able to bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale and propane gas

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Due to financial difficulties, Marilyn aims to improve her small variety store to generate sufficient income for her family. She is 40 years old, married and was blessed with three children. She dreams of becoming financially stable in order to educate her children and give them a better future. With the support of her husband, she believes that they will achieve their goals in the future. 

She plans to increase her product offerings to satisfy her customers demand and to increase her income. Due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional loan of PHP 10,000 to buy additional stocks of canned goods, junk foods, candies, beverages, detergent soaps, soft drinks and vegetables to sell. She hopes that someday, she will improve the business and make it viable in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of canned goods, junk foods, candies, beverages, detergent soaps, soft drinks and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Zosima

texts.en:
Zosima believes that, "a hard working person will become successful in the future." She is 44 years old, married and has two school-age children. They live happily in a rural community planting and harvesting corn and vegetables for sale. Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, Zosima put-up a small variety store in their village to generate additional income. She aimed to improve and strengthen the business to generate sufficient income from it. 

She is asking for an additional capital of PHP 10,000 to buy additional stocks of grocery items, rice, soft drinks and vegetables to sell. She is hoping that this financial assistance will enable her to improve the business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of grocery items, rice, soft drinks and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 28 years old, married and has three infant-age children. She aims to improve her variety store to help her husband in generating income. They both aim to earn and save more income to satisfy their necessities and save for the future of their children. Despite problems and difficulties they have encountered in life, Mary Jane has the determination to continue to improve the business in order to uplift their living standards.

To accomplish this, Mary Jane is asking for a loan of P20,000.00 to buy sugar, flour, canned goods, soft drinks, snack foods and beverages to resell. This financial assistance will be of great help in her efforts to improve the business and someday become financially stable.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, canned goods, soft drinks, snack foods and beverages to resell.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos, 2 dos quais frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 2 irmãs enviando algum valor para ajudar nas despesas correntes.

É pedreiro de profissão e tem um negocio de venda de produtos alimentares administrado pela esposa. Com  o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, frangos congelados, peixe, óleo, farinha, arroz e outros) para diversificar e aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.

No futuro pretende apostar ainda mais no negocio para poder obter mais rendimento, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais créditos na Hluvuku.

O desafio é conseguir investir suficientemente no seu negocio.
texts.en:
Antonio is married with three children, two of whom are attending school. He lives in his own house with his family and supports two of his sisters, sending them money to help with their expenses.

He is a mason and also has a business selling food products, which his wife manages. He will use this loan to buy products such as peanuts, frozen chicken, fish, oil, flour, and rice, among others. This will allow him to diversify and expand the quantity of his merchandise.

In the future, he hopes to continue developing his business to obtain more income. Therefore, he is committed to dutifully paying off this loan in order to continue working with Hluvuku.

His challenge is to sufficiently invest in his business.

loans.use: to buy products such as peanuts, frozen chicken, fish, oil, flour, and rice.

loans.name: Jennyvi

texts.en:
Jennyvi is a college graduate who is married and has one child. Her spouse is a supervisor at Harvard Jeans in Manila.The couple desires to improve their financial stability and have a better way of living.

For the past three years, Jennyvi has operated a food production business. She also has a direct sales business, in particular Personal Collection and Fuller Life. Jennyvi's food production business is better and more marketable than her direct sales business. With her determination to succeed, Jennyvi is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy kilograms of frozen foods such as sausage (longanisa), hot dogs, tocino (sweetened cured pork) and embutido (meat loaf).  She hopes and prays that she can obtain her goal and be able to access continuous financial services from lenders.

loans.use: to buy kilograms of frozen foods (meats) for her food production sales

loans.name: Angelica

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos, todos ainda menores de idade para frequentar Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua prima que vive com eles.

É comerciante e dona do negocio de venda de produtos diversos.Com  o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, chapas de zinco, pregos, arame, cimento e outros) para fazer a cobertura da outra parte da sua casa que ainda estava em falta.

No futuro deseja conseguir mais financiamentos para poder melhorar as condições de habitação,  para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais créditos na Hluvuku.

O desafio é concluir a sua casa e conseguir investir suficientemente no seu negocio.
texts.en:
Angelica is married and the mother of 2 children who are both too young to go to School. She lives in her own house with her family and supports a cousin who lives with them.

She's a trader and owns her own business selling various products. With the current loan she intends to buy construction materials (beams, zinc plates, screws, wire, cement and others) to cover the portion of her house that is missing a ceiling.

In future she hopes to obtain more financing so she can improve her living conditions. To this end, she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to finish her house and be able to invest sufficient funds into her business.

loans.use: buy construction materials (beams, zinc plates, screws, wire, cement and others) to cover the portion of her house that is missing a ceiling.

loans.name: Ermelinda

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos, 2 a frequentar Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

É comerciante e dona do negocio de venda de produtos alimentares diversos. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (refrescos, bolachas, massas, sumos e outros) para aumentar a quantidade do seu produto e satisfazer a demanda da sua clientela.

No futuro pretende fazer crescer o seu negocio e regressar a Escola para aumentar o seu nível, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais créditos na Hluvuku.

O desafio é conseguir um tempo de voltar a Escola e continuar a fazer crescer o seu negócio.
texts.en: Ermelinda is married and is the mother of three children, two of whom go to school.  She lives in her own house with her family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  She owns her own business selling various food products.  She will use this loan to buy products (soft drinks, crackers, pasta, juice, etc.) to increase her amount of merchandise to satisfy her customers' demand.  In the future, she hopes to grow her business and to go back to school to raise her level of education.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can apply for more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is finding time to go back to school and to continue making her business grow.

loans.use: to buy products (soft drinks, crackers, pasta, juice, etc.).

loans.name: Evelynda

texts.en:
Evelynda is married to a tricycle driver. The couple is blessed with four children, three of whom are studying while the youngest child is still an infant.

For the past three years, Evelynda has operated her food stall "talipapa", offering different kinds of vegetables, meat, fish and other ingredients. Her desire in life is to increase her income. For now, she manages her time wisely in order to get ahead in life and to satisfy her customer demand. Even though she has an infant, Evelynda is still able to manage her business well.

Evelynda is requesting a loan of PHP 6,000 to buy different kinds of vegetables, chicken, fish and other ingredients needed for basic commodities. She hopes to get this loan in order to obtain her goals in life.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, chicken, fish and other ingredients needed in her food stall

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
Separada e mãe de 4 filhos, outros ja maior de idade 1 a frequentar Escola, vive na casa própria com os seus filhos e não sustenta mais ninguém.

É comerciante e dona do negocio de venda de produtos diversos. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, pedra e outros) para rebocar o murro da sua casa.

No futuro pretende adquirir uma viatura para auxiliar no seu negocio, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais créditos na Hluvuku.

O desafio é trabalhar mais assegurar que seu negócio consiga lhe render de forma a juntar fundos para o seu objectivo.
texts.en: Ana is separated and the mother of four children.  Three are adults and one is in school.  She lives in her own home with her children and doesn't support anyone besides them.  She owns a business selling various products.  She will use this loan to buy construction materials (sand, cement, stone, etc.) to plaster the wall outside of her house.  In the future, she wants to acquire a vehicle help her business.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can apply for more loans from Hluvuku in the future.  Her challenge is working more to ensure that her business makes the necessary income to reach her goals.

loans.use: to buy construction matierals (sand, cement, stone, etc.).

loans.name: Elvie

texts.en:
Elvie belongs to a poor family. Her aim in life is to finish her studies, but due to her family situation, she didn't able to achieved that. She worked now as a babysitter to help her parents in providing their daily basic needs. Eventually Elvie married, and now has two children.

Elvie and her husband decided to open a mini restaurant, and they continue to work to make it more profitable. Now that the restaurant is growing, she needs to adopt another marketing strategy in order to encourage more customers and provide quality service. In order to augment their income, Elvie began to do a direct-selling business. She sells cosmetics and apparel products from a Personal Collection Company.

Elvie is now requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy stocks of cosmetics, foods, and beverages to sell. She knows that this loan could further improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of cosmetics, foods and beverages to sell

loans.name: Elsie Lily

texts.en:
Elsie Lily is married and has three children. In the absence of her spouse, she both stands as father and mother to her children. Elsie Lily has owned and operated her retail store for two years. According to her, she earns about PHP 1,500 daily. She uses her profits to pay their monthly electric bill, the allowance of her youngest child and some of the amount serves as her savings.

Elsie Lily would like to ask for a loan of PHP 8,000 which will allow her to buy groceries such as soft drinks, basic necessities and assorted biscuits for her retail store. Through this loan, she will be able to make an additional saving of her fare to and from the market. In addition, she will be able to meet the needs of her customers.

loans.use: to buy groceries such as soft drinks, basic necessities and assorted biscuits for her retail store.

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en:
Shirley is a responsible mother who aims to become financially stable in order support her husband in satisfying their family's needs and supporting the education of their children. Likewise, Shirley aims to improve her business to generate sufficient income for her family. She is 53 years old and has three children. She has owned and managed a variety store near the school campus for almost four years and usually earns a profit of PHP 10,000 a month that she usually spends on their daily consumption and the allowances of her children in school. 

She aims to increase her product offerings to satisfy her customers' demand but due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional sum of PHP 25,000 to buy junk foods, candies, biscuits, soft drinks, breads and raw ingredients to be cooked and sold on the school campus. She is hoping that she will be able to improve the business through this financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy junk foods, candies, biscuits, soft drinks, breads and raw ingredients to be cooked and sold on the school campus.

loans.name: Laura

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos, outros já maior de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua mãe e irmãos enviando algum valor para despesas de casa.

É comerciante tem um salão de cabeleireiro e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar secadores e produtos para o salão e responder com os melhores serviços a sua clientela..

No futuro pretende adquirir uma viatura para auxiliar no seu negocio, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais créditos na Hluvuku.

O desafio é adquirir todo o material necessário para poder exercer a sua actividade conforme o seu plano.
texts.en:
Laura is married and the mother of 4 children, some of whom are already of age. She lives in her own house with her family and supports her mother and brothers by sending them some money for household expenses.

She is a businesswoman and has a hairdressing salon. With this loan she plans to buy hair dryers and products for her salon so she can provide the best services for her clients.

In future, Laura intends to purchase a vehicle to help with her business. To this end, she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to acquire all the necessary materials to carry out her activities according to plan.

loans.use: buy hair dryers and products for her salon

loans.name: Tito

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos, outros ainda frequentam escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

Trabalha como segurança numa empresa privada e com o presente empréstimo C para dar continuidade com a construção da sua casa.

No futuro gostaria de terminar a sua obra e tirar carta de condução de veículos, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais créditos na Hluvuku.

O desafio é conseguir gerir o pouco fundo para poder pagar a escola de condução.
texts.en:
Tito is married and the father of 5 children, some of whom still attend School. He lives in his own house with his family and doesn't support anyone else.

He works as a security guard for a private company and plans to use the current loan to continue the construction of his home.

In future Tito would like to complete the building work and get his driver's license. To this end, he commits to duly paying off his loan so he can request further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is to manage the little funds he has to pay for driving lessons.

loans.use: continue the construction of his home

loans.name: Roide

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1 filho que frequenta Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

É militar no Ministério da Defesa Nacional e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção  (cimento, Varrão de ferro, loiça sanitária e outros) para ampliar a sua casa. 

No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa e progredir na sua carreira, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais na Hluvuku.

O desafio é realizar os seus sonhos e sustentar outros familiares que estão na Província de Manica.
texts.en:
Roide is married and the father of 1 son who attends School. He lives in his own house with his family and doesn't support anyone else.

He is part of the military for the Ministry of National Defense and with this loan he plans to buy construction materials (cement, iron rod, bathroom porcelain and others) to expand his house.

In future Roide hopes to complete his house and progress in his career. To this end, he commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is to make his dreams come true and support his other family members who are in the Manica Province.

loans.use: buy construction materials (cement, iron rod, bathroom porcelain and others) to expand his house

loans.name: Antonio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1 filho ainda menor de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

É docente e do quadro do Ministério da Educação e possui um negocio de venda de carne de vaca. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar uma balança electrónica e carne para revenda.

No futuro deseja progredir no seu negocio criando algumas espécies animais para abater e vender, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para puder aceder a mais na Hluvuku.

O desafio é a falta de um meio circulante para puder transportar a sua mercadoria.
texts.en:
Antonio is married and the father of 1 son who is still under age, lives in his own house with his family and doesn't support anyone else.

He's a teacher, a permanent employee of the Ministry of Education and  owns a business selling cow meat. With this loan he plans to buy a set of electronic scales and meat for resale.

In future Antonio hopes to progress his business by rearing some species of animals to slaughter and sell. To this end he commits to duly paying off the loan in order to access further financing from Hluvuku.

His challenge is the adequate road conditions to transport his goods.

loans.use: buy a set of electronic scales and meat for resale.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos que ainda frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta um sobrinho que vive com ele.

É comerciante e dona do negocio de venda de frangos de corte. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, ração, vitaminas e outros para aumentar a quantidade da sua criação.

No futuro deseja ampliar a sua capoeira e se tornar num grande fornecedor de frangos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais na Hluvuku.

O desafio é construir uma capoeira para passar a criar pintos em sua casa.
texts.en:
Silvia is married and the mother of 2 children who still attend School, lives in her own house with her family and supports a cousin who lives with them.

She's a trader and owns her own business breeding hens for slaughter. With this loan she plans to buy chicks, ration, vitamin and other products to increase the quantity of her production.

In future Silvia hopes to expand her hencoop and become a big supplier of chicken. To this end, she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to build a hencoop so that she can start breeding the chicks at her own house.

loans.use: buy chicks, ration, vitamin and other products

loans.name: Uzinduzi Group

texts.en:
Amesa, who is in her late 20s, is single with two girls who still go to school. She has been a food vendor for six years now. She works from 8am to 6pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will be her second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to buy more food items (some kilos of rice, sacks of charcoal, maize flour and liters of Kerosine) and she has paid back all her loan successfully. She request this loan to buy more stocks of food items to make more food to resell to more customers. Her dream is to one day be able to build a house.

She will share this loan with her loan group " Uzinduzi" which totals 19 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of food items.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos que ainda frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

É agricultora e possui uma are apropria onde desenvolve a sua actividade agrícola. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar insumos agrícolas (cenoura, couve, cebola, regador e outros) para aumentar a sua produção. 

No futuro deseja aumentar ainda mais as suas áreas de produção para melhorar o seu rendimento, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais na Hluvuku.

O desafio é conseguir produzir outras culturas no tempo chuvoso.
texts.en:
Rosita is married and the mother of 4 children who still attend School. She lives in her own house with her family and doesn't support anyone else.

She's a farmer and owns some land where she carries out her farming activities. With this loan she plans to buy farming raw materials (carrots, cabbages, onions, watering can and others) to increase her production.

In future she hopes to increase her production area even more to improve her income. To this end, she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to manage to cultivate other items in the rainy season.

loans.use: buy farming raw materials (carrots, cabbages, onions, watering can and others) to increase her production.

loans.name: Zoila Maritza

texts.es: Maritza  vive en la ciudad de Manta de la provincia de Manabí tiene  46 años de edad es divorciada tiene 2 hijos que estudian en una escuela pública cerca de su casa. Ella comenzó su negocio de costura   como un hobbies cuando le hizo disfraz para un evento a su hija en su escuela y con el pasar del tiempo ese hobbies se convirtió en su trabajo. En la actualidad ella confecciona disfraces, ella trabaja de lunes a viernes de 3 de la tarde hasta las 8 de la noche. Con el crédito comprara telas, hilos e implementos para disfraces etc.
texts.en:
Maritza lives in the city of Manta in the Manabí province.  She is 46 years old, divorced, and has 2 children who study at a public school near her house.

She began her sewing business as a hobby when she made her daughter a costume for a school event.  With the passage of time, her hobby turned into her work.  She currently makes costumes and works from Monday to Friday, from 3 in the afternoon to 8 at night.  With the loan, she will buy fabric, thread and tools for costumes, etc.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and tools for costumes, etc.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos todos frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

É comerciante e dona do seu negocio de venda de produtos diversos. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (massas, arroz, farinha, sabão, ovos, leite  e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 

No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa para melhor confortar a família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais na Hluvuku.

O desafio é concluir a sua obra e adquirir fundos para poder realizar o seu desejo.
texts.en:
Teresa is married and the mother of 4 children who all attend School. She lives in her own house with her family and doesn't support anyone else.

She's a trader and owns her own business selling various products. With this loan she plans to buy products (pasta, rice, flour, soap, eggs, milk and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future Teresa wishes to complete her house to improve the comfort of her family. To this end, she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to complete the building work on her home and acquire funds to carry out her wish.

loans.use: buy products (pasta, rice, flour, soap, eggs, milk and others) to increase the quantity of her stock

loans.name: Crane Group

texts.en:
Hassan, who is in his late 30s, is married and has two children who attend school. He has been running a business selling secondhand clothes for two years. Hassan works from 6 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

Hassan is requesting his 4th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He has repaid all of his previous loans, which he used to buy a plot of land, to start building his family house, to increase his business stock and to cover household expenses. Hassan will use this new loan to increase his inventory of secondhand clothes to resell to more customers. His dream is to one day be able to finish building his house and to expand his business in more places.

Hassan will share this loan with his group " Crane" which consists of 15 members who will hold each other accountable for repaying the loan.

loans.use: to increase his inventory of secondhand clothes to resell to more customers.

loans.name: Carlos Arturo

texts.es: Carlos tiene 28 años de edad es casado tiene 3 hijos. El comenzó en su negocio de chifleria desde hace 7 años atrás fue cuando su padre le enseño este trabajo que él decidió  comenzar a independizarse y fue con la ayuda de su esposa que dieron la apertura a las ventas de chifles. Actualmente trabaja junto a su esposa de lunes a viernes desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde. Con el crédito quiere comprar plátanos  y adecuar su local
texts.en: Carlos is a 28 year old married man, father of three children.   He started his plantain chip business seven years ago, after his father taught him how to do this type of work. Carlos decided to start his business with the help of his wife so they opened a plantain chip shop. Currently, he works with his wife Monday through Friday from 8 am to 5 pm. With this credit he will purchase plantains and make adaptations to his shop.

loans.use: to purchase plantains and make adaptations to his shop.

loans.name: Khory Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “KHORY”  iniciará el sexto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Patacamaya, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora María Elena es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de regalos, venta de verduras, venta de comida, venta de  artículos varios, venta de refrescos, venta de ropa, venta de llantas,  venta de útiles.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora María Elena es integrante, ella indica que es el segundo ciclo que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora que trabaja en la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio producción y venta de charquecan (comida tradicional de Bolivia); cuenta que este negocio lo aprendió hace años, siendo ayudante de comida, posteriormente son un pequeño capital que tuvo inicio su propio negocio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de mote, charque, etc.) que adquirirá de las ferias tradicionales del altiplano y posteriormente a la elaboración comercializará sus platos en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su hogar pues ella está casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y crédito.
texts.en:
The communal bank “KHORY” will start its sixth cycle in Pro Mujer [MFI], as part of the Focal Center of Patacamaya. The group has eight members and a governing board headed by María Elena. The members of the communal bank carry out different business activities, such as: selling gifts, food, various articles, beverages, clothing, tires, and supplies.
The requested loan will benefit microentrepeneurs like María Elena. She points out that this would be her second loan with Pro Mujer. She joined following an invitation from an MFI promoter that visited her house. Currently, she has a business producing and selling “charquecan” [traditional Bolivian dish]. She learned how to do this a long time ago working as a food assistant. Afterwards, she started her own business with a small amount of capital.
The loan will be used to increase her capital (buying maize, jerky, etc.) by acquiring it through the traditional fairs of the Bolivian altiplano. She will then prepare her dishes and sell them from her food stall. Her work has allowed her to earn an income to support her household since she is married and has three children.
When asked what she likes the most about Pro Mujer [MFI], she responds that she likes the health and credit programs.

loans.use: to buy maize, jerky, etc.

loans.name: Karla Gisela

texts.es: Karla vive en la ciudad de La Libertad provincia de Santa Elena es madre soltera tiene 1 hija de 1 mes de nacida ella. Con la ayuda de su madre Karla dio la apertura a un cibercafé, aprovechando que Karla sabe bastante de computadoras su madre la ayudo a abrir el cibercafé. Ella trabaja junto a su madre de lunes a sábado desde la 8 e la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche. Con el préstamo quiere comprar computadoras, mouse, arreglar el local etc. Su meta es implementar más computadoras para así dar un mejor servicio a su clientela
texts.en: Karla lives in the city of La Libertad within the province of Santa Elena. She is a single mother with a one-month old daughter. With her mother’s help, Karla opened a cybercafé. Given that Karla knows a lot about computers; her mother helped her to open the cybercafé. She works with her mother every Monday to Saturday from 8:00AM to 10:00PM. The loan will be used to buy computers, mice, improve the locale, etc. Her goal is to set up more computers to provide better customer service.

loans.use: to buy computers, mice, improve the locale, etc.

loans.name: Segundo Rafael

texts.es: Segundo vive en la ciudad de Manta de la provincia de Manabí. El tiene 29 años de edad  es casado tiene 2 hijos que asisten a una escuela cerca de su casa. El comenzó el trabajo de herrería a causa de que era un negocio familiar ya que su padre fue el que le enseño la labor. Realmente el tiene 4 años de haber independizado con el negocio propio de herrería. El trabaja de lunes a viernes desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde. Con el préstamo quiere comprar caladora, pinzas, materiales etc. Su meta es tener ampliar su negocio y poder enseñarles a muchas personas este trabajo
texts.en: Segundo lives in the city of Manta, Manabí Province. He is 29 years old, married, and has two children to attend a school near his home. He started working as a blacksmith because it was a family business and it was his father who taught him the trade. He has been independent, with his own blacksmith shop, for four years. He works Monday to Friday from eight in the morning until six in the evening. With the loan, he wants to buy a jigsaw, pliers, materials, etc. His goal is to expand his business and be able to teach the trade to many people.

loans.use: to buy a jigsaw, pliers, materials, etc.
